Package state

Interface IBookingState

All Known Implementing Classes:
BookingState
public interface IBookingState
IBookingState is an interface representing the portion of application state that contains all the Booking information.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Booking createBooking​(Consumer booker, EventPerformance performance, int numTickets, double amountPaid)
    Create a new Booking (includes generating a new unique booking number) and add it to the booking state
    Booking findBookingByNumber​(long bookingNumber)
    Get a Booking with the specified booking number
    List<Booking> findBookingsByEventNumber​(long eventNumber)
    Get a list of all the Bookings for a TicketedEvent with the given event number

  • Method Details

    • findBookingByNumber

      Booking findBookingByNumber​(long bookingNumber)
      Get a Booking with the specified booking number
      Parameters:
      bookingNumber - unique booking identifier to look up in the booking state
      Returns:
      Booking corresponding to the bookingNumber if there is one, and null otherwise

    • findBookingsByEventNumber

      List<Booking> findBookingsByEventNumber​(long eventNumber)
      Get a list of all the Bookings for a TicketedEvent with the given event number
      Parameters:
      eventNumber - unique event identifier to find bookings for
      Returns:
      List of Bookings for the TicketedEvent corresponding to the provided event number

    • createBooking

      Booking createBooking​(Consumer booker, EventPerformance performance, int numTickets, double amountPaid)
      Create a new Booking (includes generating a new unique booking number) and add it to the booking state
      Parameters:
      booker - Consumer who made the booking
      performance - EventPerformance that the booking is for
      numTickets - number of tickets booked
      amountPaid - amount paid for the booking in GBP
      Returns:
      The newly created Booking instance
